metadata.name: Boundless Lake
metadata.description:
Boundless Lake
1/1 by Simpalao

Salar de Uyuni, Bolivia, is the largest salt flat on Earth. During the rainy season, it turns into a giant natural mirror. Perspective doesn't matter anymore and a profound silence rules over this vast, empty space.

After a month of my solo trip between Peru and Bolivia, I couldn't believe I made it to the place that I had been dreaming of for years. It exceeded all expectations, I felt small, at peace, a sense of calmness that I had never experienced before.

My mind went still, I became the silent witness of my thoughts and of the vastness that surrounded me.

Even years later, when I become the watcher of my mind during meditation, this is how I picture myself, surrounded by this boundless landscape.

And I become boundless as well, merging with the whole existence. And that brings me calmness and joy.
